insert into moram( mr_no, mr_name, moramjigi, mr_info, mr_image, mr_cdate, mr_limit, mr_rgn, subscribe_no, subject_no, mr_state ) values( 'MR'||MR_SEQ.nextval, #mr_name#, #moramjigi#, #mr_info#, #mr_image#, sysdate, 20, #mr_rgn#, 0, #subject_no#, '정상' )

select mr_no,mr_name,mr_image from moram where mr_no in (select mr_no from moram_member where mem_id = #mem_id#) order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM
select distinct * from moram where subject_no = #subject_no#

select distinct mr_no, mr_name, mr_image from moram where mr_rgn = (select mem_rgn from member where mem_id=#mem_id#) and subject_no in(select b.subject_no from member a, mem_favcat b where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.mem_id = #mem_id#) order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM

select count(*) from moram_member where mr_no = #mr_no#
